name: Kitty Kitty Bang Bang
description:
Go against what is expected and start a revolution in this cat puzzle-adventure, created for Wowie Jam 3.0 with the theme 'Failure is progress'.

Made in way less than 48h with Unity 2020.2 and Game Creator by gypynkt (Sebastian Graetz), with original music by Tunglith. This was the first time trying myself on an animal character controller, and having a more complex quest system and environment interaction. I had to cut a level in the end because I ran out of time, it might come in the future.

WASD to move, E to interact, SPACE to jump, left SHIFT to run and jump further, ESC to pause menu.
